name: USearch
description: Find files and folders using plocate/locate (fast indexed search). Supports combined search, hardware-only search (mounted drives), and raw locate arguments.

preferences.name: Hardware search prefix
preferences.description: Prefix to trigger hardware-only search mode (default: hw). Example: 'hw query'

preferences.name: Raw locate prefix
preferences.description: Prefix to trigger raw plocate/locate mode (default: r). Example: 'r -r pattern'

preferences.name: Maximum number of results per page
preferences.description: Number of results shown per page in Ulauncher (used for pagination).
